## Load

```{r echo=FALSE}
source("/Volumes/jet/Beziehungsdynamiken/.password.R")
```
```{r}
library(codebook)
library(dplyr)
```
```{r cache=TRUE, warning = FALSE, message=F}
formr::formr_connect(email = credentials$user, password = credentials$password, host = credentials$host)
formr::formr_results("Taeglicher_Fragebogen_1", host = credentials$host, quiet = T) -> results
formr::formr_items("Taeglicher_Fragebogen_1", host = credentials$host) -> diary_items
```
